trans-unit.source: Provides a simple listener that directs tracing or debugging output to an <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个将跟踪或调试输出到定向的简单侦听器<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this EventLogTraceListener can be added to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collections to send output from tracing or debugging to an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此 EventLogTraceListener 的实例添加到<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName>要发送的跟踪或调试到<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>输出集合</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can add the instance in your code or specify it in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将实例添加在代码中或在应用程序配置文件中指定它。

trans-unit.source: To add an EventLogTraceListener using an application configuration file, edit the file that corresponds to the name of your application or the app.config file in a [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] project.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加 EventLogTraceListener 使用应用程序配置文件，编辑对应于你的应用程序的名称的文件或 app.config 文件中的[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]项目。

trans-unit.source: In this file, insert an element for a EventLogTraceListener type.
trans-unit.target: 在此文件中，插入 EventLogTraceListener 类型的元素。

trans-unit.source: The following example adds a EventLogTraceListener object named `myListener` to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例添加名为的 EventLogTraceListener 对象`myListener`到<xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `initializeData` parameter specifies the name of the event log source that is to be passed to the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: `initializeData`参数指定要传递到事件日志源的名称<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.%23ctor%28System.String%29>构造函数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.%23ctor%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: ``` <configuration> <system.diagnostics> <trace autoflush="false" indentsize="4"> <listeners> <add name="myListener" type="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener" initializeData="TraceListenerLog" /> </listeners> </trace> </system.diagnostics> </configuration> ``` For more information about how to add trace listeners in the application configuration file, see or .
trans-unit.target: ``` <configuration> <system.diagnostics> <trace autoflush="false" indentsize="4"> <listeners> <add name="myListener" type="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener" initializeData="TraceListenerLog" /> </listeners> </trace> </system.diagnostics> </configuration> ```有关如何在应用程序配置文件中添加跟踪侦听器的详细信息，请参阅或。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> for the event log that is associated with the EventLogTraceListener instance does not exist, a new event source is created.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>EventLogTraceListener 实例相关联的事件日志不存在，创建新的事件源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create an event source in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional, or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional 或 Windows Server 2003 中创建事件源，必须具有管理权限。

trans-unit.source: > > The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique.
trans-unit.target: >> 此要求的原因是所有的事件日志，包括安全性，必须进行搜索以确定事件源是否唯一。

trans-unit.source: In Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Vista 中，用户没有权限访问安全事件日志中。因此，<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>引发。</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: > > In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user.
trans-unit.target: >> 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，您分配两个运行时访问令牌︰ 一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: By default, you are in the standard user role.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色中。

trans-unit.source: To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行的代码访问安全日志，首先必须将你的特权从标准用户提升至管理员。

trans-unit.source: You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.
trans-unit.target: 通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行启动应用程序时，你可以执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: The class provides the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.EventLog%2A> property to get or set the event log that receives the tracing or debugging output, and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Name%2A> property to hold the name of the EventLogTraceListener.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.EventLog%2A>属性来获取或设置接收跟踪或调试输出，事件日志和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Name%2A>属性以存放 EventLogTraceListener 的名称。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Name%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.EventLog%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Close%2A> method closes the event log so it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Close%2A>方法关闭事件日志以使它不再接收跟踪或调试输出。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Write%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.WriteLine%2A> methods write a message to the event log.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Write%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.WriteLine%2A>方法可写消息发送到事件日志。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.WriteLine%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid the possibility of writing large amounts of data to the event log, the EventLogTraceListener does not output the optional trace data specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要避免向事件日志中写入大量的数据的可能性，EventLogTraceListener 不会输出指定的可选跟踪数据<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceListener.TraceOutputOptions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener"></xref> class without a trace listener.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener"></xref>而无需跟踪侦听器的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener"></xref> class using the specified event log.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener"></xref>类使用指定的事件日志。

trans-unit.source: The event log to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener"></xref> class using the specified source.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener"></xref>类使用指定的源。

trans-unit.source: The name of an existing event log source.
trans-unit.target: 现有的事件日志源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Closes the event log so that it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.
trans-unit.target: 关闭事件日志，以使它不再接收跟踪或调试输出。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event log to write to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要写入的事件日志。

trans-unit.source: The event log to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of this <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此名称<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property defaults to the source name of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 此属性默认为事件日志的源名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of this trace listener.
trans-unit.target: 此跟踪侦听器的名称。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 写入跟踪信息、 数据对象和事件信息写入事件日志。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A> methods are not intended to be called by application code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]1><xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>方法不应由应用程序代码调用。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>

trans-unit.source: They are called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to output trace data.
trans-unit.target: 方法调用它们<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>类输出跟踪数据存入。</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A> method, like the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> method is intended for automated tools but also allows the attaching of additional objects, for example an exception instance, to the trace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>方法、 like<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>方法适用于自动化的工具，但还允许附加其他对象，例如异常实例，对此跟踪。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`和`source`参数用于确定是否应跟踪的事件。

trans-unit.source: `id` is used to create an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> object and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> is equated to an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `id`用于创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>对象和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType>等同于<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> is written to the event log with the `data` object, formatted as a string, using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>写入事件日志`data`对象，其格式为字符串，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 的最大值`id`参数是 65,535。

trans-unit.source: If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，则使用最大值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含当前进程 ID、 线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: A name used to identify the output; typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识输出; 的名称通常生成跟踪事件的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of event that has caused the trace.
trans-unit.target: 指定引发跟踪的事件的类型的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的数值标识符。

trans-unit.source: The combination of `source` and `id` uniquely identifies an event.
trans-unit.target: 组合`source`和`id`唯一标识的事件。

trans-unit.source: A data object to write to the output file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 用于写入输出文件或流的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: source is not specified.
trans-unit.target: source未指定。

trans-unit.source: -or- The log entry string exceeds 32,766 characters.
trans-unit.target: -或者-日志条目字符串超过 32766 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, an array of data objects, and event information to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 写入跟踪信息、 数据对象和事件信息写入事件日志的数组。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A> methods are not intended to be called by application code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]1><xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>方法不应由应用程序代码调用。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>

trans-unit.source: They are called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to output trace data.
trans-unit.target: 方法调用它们<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>类输出跟踪数据存入。</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A> method, like the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> method is intended for automated tools but also allows the attaching of additional objects, for example an exception instance, to the trace.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>方法、 like<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>方法适用于自动化的工具，但还允许附加其他对象，例如异常实例，对此跟踪。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `severity` and `id` parameter data is used to create an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> object, which is written to the event log with the data from the array of data objects.
trans-unit.target: `severity`和`id`参数数据用于创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>对象，该写入事件日志的数据从数据对象的数组对象。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`和`source`参数用于确定是否应跟踪的事件。

trans-unit.source: `id` is used to create an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> object and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> is equated to an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `id`用于创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>对象和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType>等同于<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> is written to the event log with the `data` object array, formatted as a string array, using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>写入事件日志`data`对象数组，格式化为字符串数组，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 的最大值`id`参数是 65,535。

trans-unit.source: If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，则使用最大值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含当前进程 ID、 线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: A name used to identify the output; typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识输出; 的名称通常生成跟踪事件的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of event that has caused the trace.
trans-unit.target: 指定引发跟踪的事件的类型的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的数值标识符。

trans-unit.source: The combination of `source` and `id` uniquely identifies an event.
trans-unit.target: 组合`source`和`id`唯一标识的事件。

trans-unit.source: An array of data objects.
trans-unit.target: 数据对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: source is not specified.
trans-unit.target: source未指定。

trans-unit.source: -or- The log entry string exceeds 32,766 characters.
trans-unit.target: -或者-日志条目字符串超过 32766 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, a message, and event information to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 写入跟踪信息、 消息和事件信息写入事件日志。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> methods are not intended to be called by application code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]1><xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>方法不应由应用程序代码调用。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to write trace data.
trans-unit.target: 方法的调用这些方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>类将跟踪数据写入。</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>方法的意图是可由工具自动处理的跟踪事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source.
trans-unit.target: 例如监视工具可以通知管理员特定事件跟踪由特定的源。

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`和`source`参数用于确定是否应跟踪的事件。

trans-unit.source: `id` is used to create an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> object and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> is equated to an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `id`用于创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>对象和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType>等同于<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> is written to the event log with the `message` data using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>写入事件日志`message`数据使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 的最大值`id`参数是 65,535。

trans-unit.source: If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，则使用最大值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含当前进程 ID、 线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: A name used to identify the output; typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识输出; 的名称通常生成跟踪事件的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of event that has caused the trace.
trans-unit.target: 指定引发跟踪的事件的类型的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的数值标识符。

trans-unit.source: The combination of `source` and `id` uniquely identifies an event.
trans-unit.target: 组合`source`和`id`唯一标识的事件。

trans-unit.source: The trace message.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪消息。

trans-unit.source: source is not specified.
trans-unit.target: source未指定。

trans-unit.source: -or- The log entry string exceeds 32,766 characters.
trans-unit.target: -或者-日志条目字符串超过 32766 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 写入跟踪信息、 格式化的对象和事件信息写入事件日志的数组。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> methods are not intended to be called by application code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]1><xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>方法不应由应用程序代码调用。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: These methods are called by methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> classes to write trace data.
trans-unit.target: 方法的调用这些方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>， <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace>，和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource>类将跟踪数据写入。</xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace> </xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A> method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>方法的意图是可由工具自动处理的跟踪事件。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogTraceListener.TraceEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source.
trans-unit.target: 例如监视工具可以通知管理员特定事件跟踪由特定的源。

trans-unit.source: The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced.
trans-unit.target: `eventCache`和`source`参数用于确定是否应跟踪的事件。

trans-unit.source: `id` is used to create an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> object and the <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> is equated to an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `id`用于创建<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>对象和<xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType>等同于<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType>为<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.EntryType%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance> is written to the event log, using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method, with the message obtained from the `format` and `args` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>写入事件日志中，使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法，并从获取消息`format`和`args`参数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: The `args` object array is converted to a string using the <xref:System.String.Format%2A> method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message for the event log.
trans-unit.target: `args`对象数组转换为字符串使用<xref:System.String.Format%2A>方法，并传递`format`字符串和`args`要作为事件日志消息格式的字符串数组</xref:System.String.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 的最大值`id`参数是 65,535。

trans-unit.source: If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，则使用最大值。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，包含当前进程 ID、 线程 ID 以及堆栈跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: A name used to identify the output; typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
trans-unit.target: 用于标识输出; 的名称通常生成跟踪事件的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the type of event that has caused the trace.
trans-unit.target: 指定引发跟踪的事件的类型的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: A numeric identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的数值标识符。

trans-unit.source: The combination of `source` and `id` uniquely identifies an event.
trans-unit.target: 组合`source`和`id`唯一标识的事件。

trans-unit.source: A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the `args` array.
trans-unit.target: 包含零个或多个格式项中的对象对应一个格式字符串`args`数组。

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> array containing zero or more objects to format.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref>数组，其中包含零个或多个要格式化的对象。

trans-unit.source: source is not specified.
trans-unit.target: source未指定。

trans-unit.source: -or- The log entry string exceeds 32,766 characters.
trans-unit.target: -或者-日志条目字符串超过 32766 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Writes a message to the event log for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例在事件日志中写入一条消息。

trans-unit.source: The message to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的消息。

trans-unit.source: message exceeds 32,766 characters.
trans-unit.target: message超过 32766 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Writes a message to the event log for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 此实例在事件日志中写入一条消息。

trans-unit.source: The message to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的消息。

trans-unit.source: message exceeds 32,766 characters.
trans-unit.target: message超过 32766 个字符。
